document_data.name: River Soshenstar
document_data.mainbody: The '''River Soshenstar''' was one of the three great rivers of [[Chult]].<ref name=TJoC-p9>
document_data.Description: Travelers often used the river to access the interior of the jungle by canoe. It poured over a waterfall about every ten or fifteen miles on its journey to the sea.

Geography.Flora & Fauna:
The waters of the river were home to [[crocodile]]s and a wide range of [[fish]], notably [[kapenta]], [[giant tigerfish]], and several species of [[electric catfish]].

The banks of the river were home to [[boar]]s, [[dinosaur]]s, [[giant scorpion]]s, [[panther]]s, and [[saber-toothed tiger]]s, and were known to be a place where [[ryath root]] could be collected.

document_data.Inhabitants:
The [[aldani]] lived in this river,<ref name=TJoC-p6> and [[dragon turtle]]s were also common near its mouth.<ref name=TJoC-p9/>

As of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], a battle-scarred [[giant crocodile]] had taken up residence inside of a wrecked boat not far south of the river's mouth.
document_data.Notable Locations: The town of [[Port Nyanzaru]] was located at the Soshenstar's mouth.<ref name=TJoC-p27> At the end of the 15{{th}} century DR, the [[Order of the Gauntlet]] had established [[Camp Vengeance]] on its waters, a few miles north of the Aldani Basin.
